kannada_original: ಜೇಡ ಒಡ್ಡಿದ ಬಲೆಗೆ ನೊಣ ಸಿಲುಕಿತೇ ಹೊರತು
english_transliteration: Jēḍa oḍḍida balege noṇa silukitē horatu
english_translation: The fly gets caught in the web spun by the spider, but
Will an elephant fall there, even by mistake?
The saint is very far from the essence-less net of existence (Bhavajāla).

kannada_original: ನೊಣ ನೊಣವೆ, ಗಜ ಗಜವೆ ! - ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ.
english_transliteration: Noṇa noṇave, gaja gajave! - Muddu Rāma.
english_translation: A fly is a fly, an elephant is an elephant! – Muddu Rama.
